suppress.notes: file name: snakeyaml-2.0.jar Severity: HIGH These vulnerabilities are not relevant to this project's usage of snakeyaml.

file name: LatencyUtils-2.0.3.jar
Not relevant. LatencyUtils is invoked through micrometer instrumentation, which is not enabled when this project is run.

file name: commons-compress-1.22.jar
The CVE is specific to the .NET version of the library. This is the Java version. This is a false positive.

files: spring-boot-1.5.22.RELEASE.jar, spring-core-4.3.30.RELEASE.jar sev: CRITICAL False positive. Recipes which modify spring-boot code are not themselves spring-boot applications. The vulnerabilities of spring-boot applications are irrelevant.
file name: jackson-databind-2.15.2.jar This is not a really valid CVE and not really exploitable as Java code needs to be modified: https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/3972
